column2: ounsel:           A.S.M.Perera, PC with Mohamed Nazar and Chathurika Witharana  for

column1: Haripriya Jayasundara, ASG,PC, for the Respondent

column3: The instance appeal has been lodged to set aside the Judgment dated 02.07.2019.
The  Accused  Appellant  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  ‘the  Accused’)  was  indicted

column1: before the High Court of Kegalle for the following offences;

column3: 1.  The  alleged  murder  of    Mohommed  Mihilar  Thahira  Sirin  (the  Deceased)  on  or
about 14.02.2012 and thereby committing an offense punishable under Section 296
read with Section 32 of the Penal Code.
In  the  course  of  the  transaction  for  causing  grievous  hurt  to  Mohommed  Naim
Amardeen  Begam  Nausia  by  throwing  acid  and  thereby  committing  an  offence
punishable under section 315 of the Penal Code.
In the course of the transaction for causing grievous hurt to Mohommed Mustafa
Safni  Mustafa  by  throwing  acid  and  thereby  committing  an  offence  punishable
under section 315 of the Penal Code.
